definition: see 直升機|直升机[zhi2 sheng1 ji1]
straight/to straighten/fair and reasonable/frank/straightforward/(indicates continuing motion or action)/vertical/vertical downward stroke in Chinese characters
surname Zhi/Zhi (c. 2000 BC), fifth of the legendary Flame Emperors 炎帝[Yan2 di4] descended from Shennong 神農|神农[Shen2 nong2] Farmer God
to ascend/to rise to the rank of/to promote/to hoist/liter/measure for dry grain equal to one-tenth dou 斗[dou3]

sentences.english: The helicopter can carry up to eight missiles under the stub wings for anti-armour role.
sentences.chinese: 直升飛機能爲反裝甲任務在短翼下攜帶八枚導彈。

sentences.english: A good example of a Warrant Officer is a helicopter pilot.
sentences.chinese: 關於准尉的一個典型例子是直升飛機駕駛員。

sentences.english: Portugal is planning a helicopter NH90 heavy participants.
sentences.chinese: 葡萄牙是NH90重型直升飛機計劃一個參加者。

sentences.english: When the player tilts or moves the phone, the helicopter changes direction accordingly.
sentences.chinese: 當玩家傾斜或移動手機時，直升飛機也會地飛行方向。

sentences.english: The main reason that caused the accident of this plane was a malfunction of the elevator.
sentences.chinese: 這架直升飛機失事的主要原因是升降舵失靈。

sentences.english: Rescue helicopters sent early this morning retrieved 34 workers.
sentences.chinese: 今天清晨派去的救援直升飛機撤回了34名工作人員。

sentences.english: The main helicopter used in the club is Robinson R44.
sentences.chinese: 在這個社團中最主要的飛機是羅賓遜R44直升飛機。

sentences.english: Within the tower, there will be a laboratory, living accommodation and a helicopter landing station .
sentences.chinese: 鋼塔內有實驗室，生活設施和直升飛機着陸站。

sentences.english: The helicopter is stooging about the sea .
sentences.chinese: 這架直升飛機正在海面上空盤轉。

sentences.english: Helicopters circle overhead and the air has a strange cloying smell.
sentences.chinese: 直升飛機在上空盤旋，空氣中瀰漫着甜得發膩的怪味。

sentences.english: He flew us in his helicopter.
sentences.chinese: 他帶我們坐他的直升飛機。

sentences.english: The helicopter lifted the entire team to the meet.
sentences.chinese: 直升飛機把全隊空運到運動會現場。

sentences.english: Try a 11)helicopter ride starting at fifty-two US dollars for 10 minutes.
sentences.chinese: 嘗試直升飛機，10分鐘的起價是52美元。

sentences.english: Two engines are podded to the helicopter just to the rear of the cockpit.
sentences.chinese: 直升飛機上二臺發動機莢艙在駕駛員座艙的後面。

sentences.english: Israeli troops, tanks, and helicopter gunships were deployed.
sentences.chinese: 以色列軍隊，坦克和武裝直升飛機都被派出。

sentences.english: Helicopters dropped water on the fire.
sentences.chinese: 直升飛機把水掉在火上。

definition: Cebu, a province (and a city) in the Philippines (Tw)
Kai Tak Airport, international airport of Hong Kong from 1925 to 1998
to float/to hover/also written 漂浮
